pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: World Vision works with thousands of children in the Democratic Republic of Congo .
sentences.chinese: 世界宣明会与成千上万的儿童在刚果民主共和国。

sentences.english: Only about 380 of these Gorillas can be found in the DRC.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国境内约有380只银背山地大猩猩。

sentences.english: 1971 - Democratic Republic of the Congo is renamed Zaire.
sentences.chinese: 1971年的今天，刚果民主共和国重命名为扎伊尔。

sentences.english: Pygmy Family, Republic of the Congo, 2000
sentences.chinese: 俾格米人一家，刚果民主共和国，2000。

sentences.english: Michael K. Nichols Pygmy Family, Republic of the Congo, 2000
sentences.chinese: 俾格米人一家，刚果民主共和国，2000。

sentences.english: The DRC is also planning to export its electric power to Mozambique.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国目前还计划向莫桑比克出口电力。

sentences.english: The DRC has not yet benefitted from preventive vaccination campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国尚未从预防接种运动中获益。

sentences.english: The Democratic Republic of Congo has an estimated 770, 000 orphans.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国预计有770000名孤儿。

sentences.english: DR Congo's tanker accident toll rises to 269 .
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国的油轮事故死亡人数上升到269。

sentences.english: Cabinda is separated from Angola by the Democratic Republic of Congo.
sentences.chinese: 卡宾达被刚果民主共和国从安哥拉分割出去。
